source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_00<tab>With a maiden's virtue hanging in the balance, Hildibrand would hasten back to Costa del Sol.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_00<tab>Похоже, у вас нет выбора, кроме как вернуться в Коста-дель-Соль.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_01<tab>His vaunted powers of deduction having afforded him no particular insight into the identity of the phantom thief, Hildibrand is nonetheless infinitely confident that he is fully prepared for the final confrontation with his foe. Return to Costa del Sol and see if Inspector Briardien's investigation has proved more fruitful.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_02<tab>With the phantom thief still on the loose and the banquet about to begin, Inspector Briardien has determined that it is too dangerous to allow Miss Arabella to appear before the crowd at the ceremony. Obtain a set of servant's garb from the Gegeruju Manor retainer that may serve as a suitable disguise for the maiden. In the meantime, Hildibrand has been charged with creating a diversion to distract Vannes from the absence of his betrothed.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_03<tab>The Gegeruju Manor retainer furnishes you with a set of nondescript garb. Deliver it to Lady Arabella outside Costa del Sol, that she might safely hide herself from the thief's eye.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_04<tab>At Inspector Briardien's behest, Miss Arabella changes into the clothes you procured, disguising herself as a servant. He bids you deliver the exquisite garment the maiden had previously been wearing to Hildibrand, that it might avail him in his task somehow.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_05<tab>Though not entirely sure what he is meant to do with the dress you entrusted to him, Hildibrand nevertheless assures you that he has the situation under control, and encourages you to find a seat from which to enjoy the festivities.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_06<tab>Hildibrand's flawless plan, in a nutshell, involved donning the dress and presenting himself as the lapis maiden. When Vannes reacts with utter shock, Hildibrand concludes that he is the phantom thief in disguise, as the true Vannes─who had never before seen Miss Arabella's face─would never have suspected that aught was amiss. His logic failing to find a sympathetic ear, Hildibrand is immediately seized by the Brass Blades of the Gerbera.

No sooner does this happen than does Vannes recognize Arabella amidst the crowd and grab her by the hand. Inspector Briardien recognizes the glove on Vannes's right hand, but before he can take action, the thief reveals himself in a puff of smoke, summoning the vicious Mandragoras to protect him. A close encounter with Hildibrand sends the rogue vegetables fleeing in terror, but the thief has already made off with his treasure─not the maiden herself, but the neckpiece she wore.

As Miss Arabella, now free from her betrothal to Vannes, breathes a sigh of relief, a flying card of challenge buries itself in Hildibrand's pate, writ “I shall come to claim the victor's spoils.” Though Inspector Briardien finally deduces that the thief and the mad bombardier who almost claimed his life are not one and the same, the two inspectors nevertheless vow that the thief has stolen his last treasure.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_07<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SEQ_07<tab>

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Briardien in Costa del Sol.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_00<tab>Поговорите с Бриардьеном в Коста-дель-Соль.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a set of servant's garb from the Gegeruju Manor retainer.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_01<tab>Получите форму служанки у слуги особняка Гугурему.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the servant's garb to Arabella.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_02<tab>Передайте форму служанки Арабелле.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the breathtaking dress to Hildibrand.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_03<tab>Отдайте изумительной платье в лапы Хильдибранда.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_04<tab>Take your position and wait for the banquet to begin.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_04<tab>Встаньте на указанное место и ждите начала банкета.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_05<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_TODO_05<tab>

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_000<tab>We've not a moment to lose, friend! The time of our final confrontation with the fiend is nigh!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_000<tab>Мы не можем позвалить себе медлить. Совсем скоро мы столкнёмся со злодеем в последний раз!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_001<tab>Our foe has doubtless assumed a new identity, but have no fear! Upon our return to Costa del Sol, I shall employ the time<var 1F /var>tested Manderville art of parley to cut through the fiend's flimsy facade!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_001<tab>Нет сомнений в том, что он уже надел новую маску, но беспокоиться не стоит. По нашему прибытию в Коста-дель-Соль я в мгновенье ока сниму с него ложный лик при помощи "Мандервилльской Дипломатии"!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_002<tab>'Tis an art that I would impart to you as well, friend, though there will be time enough for that once our foe is in shackles and Miss Arabella is safe.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_002<tab>Я бы с радостью обучил вас этому семейному искусству, как когда-то обучил вам семейному танцу. Всему своё время, сначала надо обеспечить безопасность мисс Арабеллы.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_003<tab>No doubt it shall prove as invaluable in your adventures as it has in my investigations─or failing that, serve to entertain you when you have nothing better to do.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_003<tab>Я уверен, что оно пригодится вам в ваших странствиях. С этой техникой вы сможете стать таким же... КХМ... <var 1A 02 /var>Почти<var 1A 01 /var>таким же первоклассным детективом, как ваш верный слуга.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_004<tab>...But I digress. A gentleman must away to Costa del Sol─the fair maiden's life hangs in the balance! Nashu, Miss Ellie─with me!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_004<tab>А сейчас нас зовёт долг! Немедленно отправляемся в Коста-дель-Соль.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_010<tab>That fellow under the table looks terribly suspicious...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_010<tab>Какой подозрительный джентльмен лежит под столом...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_015<tab>I must return to the estate to prepare for the banquet. Till we meet again, friend.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_015<tab>Я поеду вместе с Левенхартом, чтобы подготовиться к банкету. До встречи на празднике.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_030<tab>Inspector Briardien! I have seen to the maiden's safety─Miss Arabella will be along soon. How fares your investigation?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_030<tab>Дорогой коллега, можете не беспокоиться о безопасности мисс Арабеллы, она совсем скоро должна прибыть. Как всё проходит с вашей стороны?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_031<tab>I have canvassed the grounds, but none of the guests are concealing their hands. How can this be!? The thief must be <var 1A 02 /var>somewhere<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_031<tab>Я осмотрел всех, кто здесь находится, но никто не скрывает своих рук. Что тут происходит?! Вор не мог просто сбежать!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MOB01441_000_032<tab>Miss Arabella just left her estate, I hear. I suppose we'll find out soon enough if her beauty is truly a match for our own. Tee hee!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MOB01441_000_032<tab>Я слышал, что мисс Арабелла только что выехала из особняка. Интересно, будет ли её красота наравне с нашей?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_033<tab>There's no time. Without the thief in custody, we cannot risk allowing Miss Arabella to take the stage.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_033<tab>Время на исходе. Пока вор на свободе, мы не можем позволить мисс Арабелле выйти на люди.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_034<tab>B-But, Inspector, Vannes and his family will not take kindly to his betrothed's absence.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_034<tab>Не думаю, что семья жениха отнесётся к этому с пониманием.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_035<tab>Hmph! That is nothing of my concern. Besides, doubtless the <var 1A 02 /var>inspector<var 1A 01 /var> here will think of something.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_035<tab>С чего это меня должно волновать их мнение когда на кону стоит жизнь девушки?! Ну ладно, нужно хоть что-то с этим поделать... Пусть Хильдибранд займёт их внимание!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_036<tab>M-Me? What do you propose!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_036<tab>Я? Почему я? Мне хотелось снова повидаться с госпожой Арабеллой...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_037<tab>You're the expert at creating diversions. Can't you just knock something over, blow something up, or the like? You know─like you <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> do?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_037<tab>Потому что ты горазд привлекать внимание. Можешь, ну я не знаю, похвастаться перед ними своими мускулами. Это задача, с которой сможешь справиться только ты!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_038<tab>Inspector Briardien! I knew the day would come that you recognized my many talents! Worry not about Master Vannes! Yes, for the sake of the maiden, a gentleman will do what must needs be done!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_038<tab>Ах, <var 1A 02 /var>целесообразный<var 1A 01 /var> инспектор Бриардьен, вы наконец признали один из многих моих талантов! Вам не стоит беспокоиться по поводу господина Ваннеса! Да, я немедля пойду выполнять поставленную мне задачу!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_039<tab>...The poor sop lacks even the wits to know when he's being insulted. Now, to the task at hand. We must find a way to conceal Miss Arabella's true identity.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_039<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Частный<var 1A 01 /var> инспектор... Идиоту не хватает мозгов даже одно слово выучить. А теперь когда он больше не будет нам мешать, стоит обсудить план. Самым разумным курсом для нас является сокрытие личности лазурной девы до поимки вора.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_040<tab>Not far from here are the servants' quarters. There should be a change of clothes lying about.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_040<tab>Ту как раз неподалёку расположены покои для слуг. Я уверена, что там будет нетяжело раздобыть не выделяющуюся одежду.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_041<tab>...Perfect. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Find some suitably ordinary garb and deliver it to Miss Arabella outside the gates. I shall proceed with the investigation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_041<tab>...Прекрасно. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, раз ты уже <var 08 E905 ((успел)) ((успела)) /var> познакомиться с Мисс Арабеллой, то именно тебе и предстоит добыть одежду и доставить её деве.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_050<tab>Leave the betrothed and his family to me, my friend! Master Vannes will not suspect for a moment that aught is amiss!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_050<tab>Оставьте жениха с его отцом мне! Господин Ваннес ничего не заподозрит!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_055<tab>Find some inconspicuous garb from the servants' quarters and deliver it to Miss Arabella outside the gates. I shall proceed with the investigation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_055<tab>Найди какую-нибудь не выделяющуюся одежду и отнеси её мисс Арабелле, когда она сюда прибудет.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SERVANT01441_000_070<tab>Has the lapis maiden arrived yet? I simply must look upon her beauty for myself!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SERVANT01441_000_070<tab>Лазурная дева уже успела прибыть? Так хочется увидеть, взаправду ли она такая красивая!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SERVANT01441_000_071<tab>Servant's garb, you say? I much prefer what you're wearing, but we certainly have enough rags to go around. Here you go─do with them as you will.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SERVANT01441_000_071<tab>Говорите, вам нужна одежда для прислужников? Мне куда больше нравится то, что вы сейчас носите, но у меня тут как раз завалялась форма.<var 09 E948 (()) (()) (( Правда, она вам великовата будет...)) (()) (( Правда, она вам маловата будет...)) (()) (( Правда, она вам маловата будет...)) (()) /var>

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SERVANT01441_000_075<tab>Has the lapis maiden arrived yet? I simply must look upon her beauty for myself!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SERVANT01441_000_075<tab>Лазурная дева уже успела прибыть? Так хочется увидеть, взаправду ли она такая красивая!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_100<tab>Greetings, friend. Oh? What's this you have for me?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_100<tab>Вот мы и снова встретились. М? У тебя для меня что-то есть?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_110<tab>Servant's garb...? But why?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_110<tab>Форма прислужницы? Зачем она мне?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_111<tab>Miss Arabella. With the thief still at large, the risk of letting you be seen is too great. Change into those clothes and promise that you will not leave my sight.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_111<tab>Мисс Арабелла, это ради вашей же безопасности. Пожалуйста, наденьте эти одеяния и не отходите от меня.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_112<tab>B-But the ceremony! Father will be furious! And Lord Vannes...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_112<tab>А как же церемония?! Отец будет в ярости. А лорд Ваннес...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_113<tab>We are dealing with a man who tried to blast me to the heavens...and almost succeeded. We cannot exercise enough caution. As for the ceremony, I have entrusted the matter to a certain gentleman. You need only concern yourself with your own safety.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_113<tab>Мы имеем дело с человеком, который почти отправил меня эфирное море... Почти. Надеюсь, вы понимаете, насколько ситуация серьёзная. А что насчёт другого инспект... Джентльмена, он прямо сейчас занят семьёй вашего жениха.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_LEWENHART_000_114<tab>We should do as the inspector says, Miss Arabella. Your life is more important than this marriage, or whatever profits your father stands to gain from it.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_LEWENHART_000_114<tab>Думаю, стоит поступить как нам говорит инспектор, мисс Арабелла. Ваша жизнь куда более ценная, чем гилы, который ваш отец получит с этой свадьбы.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_115<tab>Lewen, if Father heard you say such things...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_115<tab>Как хорошо, что отец тебя сейчас не услышал...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_LEWENHART_000_116<tab>...I should have said them long ago. By not doing so, I have put your life in danger. But besides, we have not one, but two skilled inspectors on the case. It will not be long until the fiend is brought to justice.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_LEWENHART_000_116<tab>Мне всё равно. Для меня главное - ваша безопасность и мне стыдно, что я не сказал этих слов раньше. Стоит оставить это дело этим инспекторам, они-то смогут поймать преступника.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_117<tab>...Very well. I shall retreat to the carriage. Pray wait for me here.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_117<tab>...Ладно, ты меня убедил. Подождите меня, я пойду, переоденусь в карете.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_118<tab>My apologies for the delay. What should I do with my banquet dress, Inspector?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_118<tab>Спасибо, что дождались меня. Что мне делать с праздничным платьем, инспектор?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_119<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Bring Miss Arabella's dress to that bumbling inspector. I dare not speculate as to how he intends to see to his task, but I would imagine he requires all the help he can get. Now, let us return before the festivities begin.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_119<tab>Я об этом не подумал. Хм, в карете оставлять его не стоит, вор может его увидеть и что-то заподозрить... При себе его оставлять не стоит по той же самой причине... А вот если вор увидит это платье у Хильдибранда, он просто посчитает, что это очередная проделка недоинспектора!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_125<tab>You will not elude me this time, fiend...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_125<tab>Вот мы тебя и перехитрили, тысячеликий вор!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_150<tab>Ah, you return! Me? I was in the act of formulating a master plan to distract Master Vannes at the ceremony. Is there aught I might do for you?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_150<tab>Вот <var 08 E905 ((моя вторая любимая ассистентка вернулась)) ((второй любимый ассистент вернулся)) /var>. Я прямо сейчас в процессе формулирования плана по отвлечению уважаемого Ваннеса. М, у вас ко мне просьба?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_155<tab>Why, this is...Miss Arabella's dress? I must admit to some confusion as to what to do with it... But worry not! I shall take it into safekeeping!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_155<tab>Вы хотите отдать мне на хранение платье мисс Арабеллы?! Признаю, это предложение <var 1A 02 /var>пришло из синевы<var 1A 01 /var>... Но вам не о чем беспокоиться, я буду охранять его как зеницу ока!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_156<tab>And with that, I must attend to Master Vannes before the ceremony begins.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_156<tab>А теперь прошу извинить меня, мне нужно уделить своё внимание господину Ваннесу.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_157<tab>Worry not, friend! I assure you that Inspector Briardien and I have the situation entirely under control! Why not find yourself a seat and enjoy the festivities?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_157<tab>И теперь вы можете расслабиться, дорогой товарищ. Уверяю вас, у меня с <var 1A 02 /var>запасным<var 1A 01 /var> инспектором Бриардьеном всё под контролем! Присаживайтесь и наслаждайтесь праздником.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_300<tab>Curses! How am I supposed to find my man with all these people milling about!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_300<tab>И как мне искать вора, когда здесь собрано столько народа?!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_YALTONOLTO_000_301<tab>Friends...family...business associates. 'Tis an honor and a pleasure to welcome one and all to Costa del Sol for today's feast, co<var 1F /var>hosted by the Brugaire Consortium and the East Aldenard Trading Company.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_YALTONOLTO_000_301<tab>Друзья, семья, коллеги. Я рад видеть вас сегодня в Коста-дель-Соль на нашем празднике, организованном при поддержке «Консорциума Брюгейра» и Восточной торговой компании Альденарда.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SAINANA_000_302<tab>We trust that you've been enjoying fine food, fine spirits, and profitable conversation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SAINANA_000_302<tab>Мы надеемся, что вы наслаждаетесь едой, напитками и разговорами.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MOB01441_000_303<tab>The lapis maiden! If even half the tales of her beauty are true, Vannes is the luckiest bastard in the realm!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MOB01441_000_303<tab>Лазурная дева! Если хотя бы половина слухов о её красоте правдивы, то Ваннес будет самым удачливым пацаном на свете!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MORGANT_000_304<tab>Yalto Nolto, Sainana...honored guests. It's a great pleasure to announce the betrothal of my son, Vannes─future chair of the Brugaire Consortium─to Arabella, daughter of Master Guguremu of the East Aldenard Tradin' Company.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MORGANT_000_304<tab>Яльто Нольто, Сайнана... Дорогие друзья. Сегодня я с привеликой радостью объявляю о помолвке моего сына, Ваннеса, будущего главы «Консорциума Брюгейра» с Арабеллой, дочерью господина Гугурему, главы Восточной торговй компании Альденарда.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MORGANT_000_305<tab>The couple would exchange their eternal vows 'ere today, that the 'appiness that is theirs may usher in a new era of prosperity for one and all.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MORGANT_000_305<tab>Здесь и сейчас, мои дорогие друзья, Ванн официально сделает предложение своей обожаемой Арабелле! Давайте же выпьем за их счастье и здоровье. И, конечно же, за будущие отношения наших компаний!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MORGANT_000_306<tab>Ladies and gentlemen, may I present my son's lovely bride! The lapis maiden, whose beauty minstrels will sing of for ages to come!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MORGANT_000_306<tab>Дамы и господа, позвольте представить вам невесту моего сына! Лазурная дева, слухи о чьей красоте пронеслись по всей Эорзии!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_307<tab>Damn you, Hildibrand Manderville! You had <var 1A 02 /var>one job<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_307<tab>Что он там делает?! Что пришло в его пустую башку?!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_308<tab>She's... She's beautiful!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_308<tab>Она... Она прекрасна!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_309<tab>Hmph! Were the rabble expecting otherwise? She is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> bride, after all.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_309<tab>Ах, они все так удивлены красотой моей невесты. Даже зная о её красоте, они всё равно пришли в изумление.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_310<tab>Milady. They say your beauty transcends even the boundaries of time. When we are wed, you will want for nothing. Pray give your hand unto me.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_311<tab>(-Hildibella-)My sun and stars! Yes, yes─a thousand times yes! I am yours, and shall be forevermore!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_312<tab>Wh-What have you done with my bride, you cross<var 1F /var>dressing deviant!?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_313<tab><groan> ...Not quite what I had intended, but I suppose it serves our purposes.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_314<tab>Fear not, ladies and gentlemen, for Miss Arabella is safe and sound! I, Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire, have but assumed the maiden's appearance to ensnare the vile fiend who would take aim at her life!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_315<tab>The fiend who now lies defenselessly before me! The game is up, Vannes! Or shall I call you by another name...the thief of many faces!

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_316<tab>今この会場で「怪盗白仮面」が変装している人物……。
それは、私の隣にいるヴァンネス殿ですぞ！！
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_317<tab>M-Me, the thief!? Are you mad?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_318<tab>It appears that my masterful deductions have proved beyond the grasp of your mind. Very well! Allow me to elucidate.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_319<tab>While there is not a soul in the realm who has not heard the tales of Miss Arabella's beauty, there are but two men here in Costa del Sol who had gazed upon her lovely visage before today─her father, Guguremu, and her steward, Lewenhart.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_320<tab>As you yourself admitted on multiple occasions, Master Vannes, you were to have your first glimpse of your bride-to-be today. Considered in this light, would you not say your reaction upon seeing my face was most...unnatural?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_321<tab>Who else could see through my ingenious disguise? Who could know at a glance that I was not the fair maiden!? None save you─ye of a thousand faces!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_322<tab>(-Ellie-)...And anyone <var 1A 02 /var>else<var 1A 01 /var> with half their wits about them!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_323<tab>H-How dare you make a mockery of my wedding day!? Guards! Arrest that pervert at once! Lock him up in gaol and throw away the key!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_VANNES_000_324<tab>Arabella? Oh, thank the gods you're safe! Come with me quickly─there's a dangerous madman about!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_325<tab>A glove on his right hand! Could it be...!?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_326<tab>Ahahaha! The man is a fool, but it would have behooved you to listen to him. Alas, you did not, and what is yours is now mine.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_MOB201441_000_327<tab>Th-That's the thief! Stop wasting your time with that imbecile and arrest him!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_328<tab>You came all this way...for me? You love me! You really, <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> love me!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_329<tab>The attention is most flattering, but I have taken what I came for, and now I must away. Milords, miladies─till we meet again!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_330<tab>I hear that the real Vannes was found bound and gagged in a storage room. Truly, Miss Arabella, I am sorry...

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_331<tab>For what, milady? The banquet was more exciting than I ever could have hoped for. Vannes and his father were furious, of course, and our marriage has been called off.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_332<tab>...But perhaps it is for the best. I would find my own way to make Father happy, by living my life as I would live it. It is you, Inspector Hildibrand, who taught me this lesson.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_000_333<tab>For the love of the gods, somebody find him a change of clothes.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ELLIE_100_333<tab>But one thing still puzzles me. The thief's challenge said he would steal the lapis maiden's virtue. Yet in the end, he took only her neckpiece...

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_LEWENHART_000_334<tab>Now that you mention it, Master Guguremu told me about the clasp when it first arrived. Engraved with the mark of the sun goddess, it is one of the most treasured pieces from the Brugaire collection, known by many as “Azeyma's Virtue”...
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_335<tab>The maiden's virtue, indeed. When the next challenge comes, we must take extra care to read between the lines.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_336<tab>Over here, Inspector! It says, er...“Made you look!”
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_337<tab>The fiend plays us for fools! Give that to me at once!

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_338<tab>“When next we meet, I shall come to claim the victor's spoils.”
...Hmph, another riddle.

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_339<tab>If nothing else, it appears the thief has abandoned any foolish notions of my assassination. Still, we must ever be on guard. The fiend attempted murder once─he may very well do so again.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_340<tab>V-Verily, Inspector! I must agree! One can never be too wary when dealing with a murderer!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_BRIARDIEN_000_341<tab>Hear me, man of a thousand faces. You sealed your fate when you called me out by name. Mark my words: when next we meet, you will be mine.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_342<tab>Yes, it was the phantom thief who was to blame for that bomb! Truly, verily, indubitably the phantom thief! Most certainly! Hahaha! Haha... Ha... Ha...?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>You have unlocked the Parley mini-game. Entertain yourself as many a Manderville man has before you by opening the toy chest in any inn room.
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_500<tab>To the victor goes a priceless treasure!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_501<tab>While the smile of a champion holds secrets untold!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_502<tab>Are eight legs better than two?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_000_503<tab>Can a Manderville man triumph over terrors and win the day?
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_504<tab>The key to the next case is also the key to the storeroom! Be sure not to lose it!

TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_505<tab>...Wait, it's a real key <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> a figurative one? At the same time?
Is that even possible? ...I guess we'll find out next time!
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ERAPITAROPI_000_301<tab>
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_HILDIBRAND_100_313<tab>
TEXT_CHRHDB304_01441_ARABELLA_000_334<tab>
